weka.filters

Interface StreamableFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Add, AddExpression, AddValues, ChangeDateFormat, ClassAssigner, Copy, FirstOrder, FixedDictionaryStringToWordVector, MakeIndicator, MergeManyValues, MergeTwoValues, MultiFilter, NominalToBinary, NonSparseToSparse, NumericCleaner, NumericToBinary, NumericTransform, Obfuscate, OrdinalToNumeric, RandomSubset, Remove, RemoveByName, RemoveType, RemoveWithValues, RenameAttribute, RenameNominalValues, RenameRelation, Reorder, ReplaceMissingWithUserConstant, ReservoirSample, SimpleStreamFilter, SortLabels, SparseToNonSparse, SwapValues

    public interface StreamableFilter
    Interface for filters can work with a stream of instances.
    Version:
    $Revision: 8034 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
